      • initializeGame

        public void initializeGame()
        Diese Methode initialisiert das Spiel im Debug-Modus, d.h. es wird ein AppGameContainer gestartet, der keine Fenster erzeugt und aktualisiert. Sie muessen / koennen diese Methode erweitern

      • stopGame

        public void stopGame()
        Stoppe das im Hintergrund laufende Spiel

      • runGame

        public void runGame(int ms)
        Run the game for a specified duration. Laesst das Spiel fuer eine angegebene Zeit laufen
        Parameters:
        ms - duration of runtime of the game

      • rememberGameData

        public void rememberGameData()
        all the game data is stored. This method is needed to restore the game data after the testing. The term game data denotes every information, which the game saves between different runs (like settings and the chosen player names).

      • restoreGameData

        public void restoreGameData()
        restores the saved game data. This method is called after the tests. It should make sure that

      • setPlayerNames

        public void setPlayerNames(java.lang.String player1Name,
                           java.lang.String player2Name)
        this method should set the two player names if the gorillas game currently is in the GameSetupState
        Parameters:
        player1Name - the name of player 1
        player2Name - the name of player 2

      • startGameButtonPressed

        public void startGameButtonPressed()
        if the gorillas game is in the GameSetupState, this method should simulate a press on a button, which starts the game. If both names are set and they are not empty and not equal the game should enter the GamePlayState. Otherwise it should stay in the GameSetupState.

      • fillVelocityInput

        public void fillVelocityInput(char charac)
        simulates the input of a character in the velocity input field. The velocity value of the current shot parameterization should be adjusted according to the input. It should only be possible to insert velocity values between 0 and 200.
        Parameters:
        charac - the input character

      • getVelocityInput

        public int getVelocityInput()
        Returns:
        the velocity value of the current shot parameterization. If nothing was put in the method should return -1.

      • fillAngleInput

        public void fillAngleInput(char charac)
        simulates the input of a character in the angle input field. The angle value of the current shot parameterization should be adjusted according to the input. It should only be possible to insert angle values between 0 and 360.
        Parameters:
        charac - the input character

      • getAngleInput

        public int getAngleInput()
        Returns:
        the angle value of the current shot parameterization. If nothing was put in the method should return -1.

      • resetPlayerWidget

        public void resetPlayerWidget()
        should clear the angle input and the velocity input field of the current player. Both angle value and velocity value should then be -1.

      • shootButtonPressed

        public void shootButtonPressed()

      • getNextShotPosition

        public org.newdawn.slick.geom.Vector2f getNextShotPosition(org.newdawn.slick.geom.Vector2f startPosition,
                                                           int angle,
                                                           int speed,
                                                           boolean fromLeftToRight,
                                                           int deltaTime)
        Computes the next position of a throw. Your method has to evaluate the parameters as defined by the task description. You can choose your own time scaling factor. The constraint is: The gameplay. This means on one hand, that the user does not have to wait for minutes till the shot either collides or leaves the screen (not too slow). On the other hand, the user has to be able to follow the shot with the eyes (not too fast). To ensure testability, please provide your time scaling factor via getTimeScalingFactor().
        Parameters:
        startPosition - the (x,y) start position of the shot. The upper left corner of the game screen is (0,0). The lower right corner of the game screen is (width of game screen, height of game screen).
        angle - the starting angle in degree from 0 to 360
        speed - the speed in a range from 0 to 200
        deltaTime - the time passed in ms
        fromLeftToRight - true if the shot was fired by the left player and thus moves from left to right, otherwise false
        Returns:
        the next position of the shot

      • getTimeScalingFactor

        public float getTimeScalingFactor()
        Ensure that this method returns exactly the same time scaling factor, which is used within the calculations of the parabolic flight to make it look more realistic. For example: 1/100.
        Returns:
        the time scaling factor for the parabolic flight calculation

      • getEmptyError

        public java.lang.String getEmptyError()
        This method should provide the tests with your custom error message for the case that a name input field is left empty
        Returns:
        the message your game shows if a player's name input field is left empty and the start game button is pressed

      • getEqualError

        public java.lang.String getEqualError()
        This method should provide the tests with your custom error message for the case that player one and player two choose the same name
        Returns:
        the message your game shows if both player names are equals and the start game button is pressed

      • getPlayer1Error

        public java.lang.String getPlayer1Error()
        This method should return the name input error message for player one.
        Returns:
        the error message for the name input of player one (empty String if the name is ok) or null in case the game is not in the GameSetupState

      • getPlayer2Error

        public java.lang.String getPlayer2Error()
        This method should return the name input error message for player two.
        Returns:
        the error message for the name input of player two (empty String if the name is ok) or null in case the game is not in the GameSetupState

      • handleKeyPressed

        public void handleKeyPressed(int updatetime,
                             java.lang.Integer input)
        This Method should emulate the key pressed event. Diese Methode emuliert das Druecken beliebiger Tasten.
        Parameters:
        updatetime - Zeitdauer bis update-Aufruf
        input - z.B. Input.KEY_K, Input.KEY_L

      • handleKeyPressN

        public void handleKeyPressN()
        This Method should emulate the pressing of the n key. This should start a new game. Diese Methode emuliert das Druecken der 'n'-Taste. (Dies soll es ermoeglichen, das Spiel neu zu starten)
